required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Patient and Physician's Satisfaction After a Long Term Treatment of Glabellar Lines With Dysport®
clinical_study.official_title: An Assessment of Patient and Physician's Satisfaction After a Long Term Treatment of Glabellar Lines With Dysport®.

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to look at patient and physician satisfaction of long term Glabellar lines (GL) treatment with Dysport in a real life setting. It will also allow better understanding of what patients expect from the treatment, and the injection practices used by doctors.

primary_outcome.measure: To assess patient satisfaction regarding GL after three injection cycles of Dysport.
primary_outcome.description: Assessed by patient auto questionnaire completion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 3 weeks ±7 days of visit 1 and 2
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed by patient auto questionnaire completion

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess patient satisfaction after one and two injection cycles of Dysport.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 3 weeks ±7 days of visit 1 and 2
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed by patient auto questionnaire completion

secondary_outcome.measure: To describe factors associated with patient satisfaction such as attractiveness, self-esteem, self-perceived age, desire to receive another injection.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 3 weeks ±7 days of visit 1 and 2
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed by patient auto questionnaire completion

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess the GL severity (at rest and maximum frown) as per usual practice.
secondary_outcome.description: Physician assessment using GL severity scale

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess physician satisfaction after one and three injection cycles of Dysport.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 follow up visit and visit 3 follow up visit (if performed)

secondary_outcome.measure: To describe Dysport injection practices: muscles injected, total injected units, total volume injected, number of injection points and interval between injections.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From visit 1 until the end of the study

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patient with moderate to severe GL naïve of any type of aesthetic treatment/procedure (invasive and non-invasive) for GL who provided written informed consent to take part.
- Patient who has prior to and independent of the study decided to undergo long term treatment of GL only (at least three cycles).
- Patient able to comply with the protocol (completion of web questionnaires).
- Patient whom physician intended to treat with Dysport independent of participation in the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient already included in this study.
- Participation in an interventional trial within 30 days prior to study entry.
- Patient who is at risk in terms of precautions, warnings, and contraindication (follow local Summary of Product Characteristics (SmPC) of Dysport).
- Female patient who is pregnant, nursing or planning a pregnancy during the study.
- Hypersensitivity to Dysport® or to its excipients.
- Presence of infection at the proposed injection sites.
- Presence of myasthenia gravis, Eaton Lambert syndrome or amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.

facility.name: FI IF & TC & apos; Eye microsurgery & apos
